analysis.summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the performance test. It is crucial to investigate the cause of this failure and optimize the page to improve its load time.
insights: The load times for all passing pages are within the recommended range, providing a good user experience.
The Time to First Byte (TTFB) for all pages is relatively low, indicating fast server response times.
The blog page has a higher load time than the other pages, mainly due to a higher First Contentful Paint (FCP). Investigating and optimizing this metric could further improve user experience.
